ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (POLICE ENFORCEMENT) REGULATIONS by extending the investigation-related exemptions under the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act to investigations conducted under any other Act of Parliament.
